    @allure.title(
        "Test to verify that user can execute job with solo task lock on a task in a prototype with both verification "

    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.solo_task_lock

    def test_execute_job_with_solo_task_lock_on_task_in_prototype_with_both_verification_enabled(self,
                                                                                                 user_group_creation,

                                                                                                 users_list):

        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))

        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.verify_self(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"])
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_self(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"])
        self.job_obj.assign_peer(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"], username=users_list,
                                 job_execution_by=job_execution_by)
